com.im.njams.sdk.settings

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.im.njams.sdk.settings.Settings

  • public class Settings
extends Object
    The settings contains settings needed for Njams
    Author:
    bwand

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String PROPERTY_DISCARD_POLICY
      This property decides what to do with a logmessage that couldn't be delivered (because of connection loss, full queue, etc.)
      static String PROPERTY_FLUSH_INTERVAL
      This property is a flush criterium with a default of 30s.
      static String PROPERTY_FLUSH_SIZE
      This property is a flush criterium with a default of 5mb.
      static String PROPERTY_MAX_QUEUE_LENGTH
      This property's default is 8 messages that can be hold in the message Queue before the messages will be discarded or client will stop processing until the queue has space again.
      static String PROPERTY_MAX_SENDER_THREADS
      This property's default is 8 sender threads as maximum threads that can be used.
      static String PROPERTY_MIN_SENDER_THREADS
      This property's default is 1 sender thread as core thread (that means it can't be closed even if its idle time has been exceeded) that can send project and log messages to the server.
      static String PROPERTY_SENDER_THREAD_IDLE_TIME
      This property's default is 10000 (ms) that means that idle sender threads that haven't send any message in the last 10 seconds and are not core threads will be removed.
      static String PROPERTY_USE_DEPRECATED_PATH_FIELD_FOR_SUBPROCESSES
      New field subProcessPath has been added for Messageformat 4.1.0 This Property can be set to use deprecated format; this might be used when sending to a server not compatible because he uses an older Messageformat version.

      Return Properties, which contains only the properties starting with a given prefix.
      Properties filterAndCut(String prefix)
      Return new Properties, which contains only the properties starting with a given prefix, stripped from that prefix.
      Properties getAllProperties()
      Return all Properties.They will be decoded because user cannot know which ones are encoded.
      String getProperty(String key)
      Return decoded property or null if not found
      String getProperty(String key, String defaultValue)
      * Return decoded property or default value if not found
      void printPropertiesWithoutPasswords()
      This method prints all Properties, but the values of all keys that contains "password" or "credentials" are changed to "****".
      void printPropertiesWithoutPasswords(org.slf4j.Logger logger)
      This method prints all properties to the given logger, but the values of all keys that contain "password" or "credentials" are changed to "****".
      void put(String key, String value)
      Put a key/value pair to settings.
      void reset()
      Reset the settings, which means everything will be deleted.

    • Field Detail

      • PROPERTY_FLUSH_SIZE

        public static final String PROPERTY_FLUSH_SIZE
        This property is a flush criterium with a default of 5mb. If the flush size of the logmessage exceedes this threshold, the message will be flushed
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_FLUSH_INTERVAL

        public static final String PROPERTY_FLUSH_INTERVAL
        This property is a flush criterium with a default of 30s. If no logmessage has been sent in the last 30 seconds, the logmessage will be flushed now
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_MIN_SENDER_THREADS

        public static final String PROPERTY_MIN_SENDER_THREADS
        This property's default is 1 sender thread as core thread (that means it can't be closed even if its idle time has been exceeded) that can send project and log messages to the server.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_MAX_SENDER_THREADS

        public static final String PROPERTY_MAX_SENDER_THREADS
        This property's default is 8 sender threads as maximum threads that can be used. This means if there are more messages to handle than there are sender threads at the moment and the threshold hasn't exceeded, a new thread will be started. If the thread isn't in use for (look below njams.client.sdk.senderthreadidletime), the thread will be removed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_MAX_QUEUE_LENGTH

        public static final String PROPERTY_MAX_QUEUE_LENGTH
        This property's default is 8 messages that can be hold in the message Queue before the messages will be discarded or client will stop processing until the queue has space again.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_SENDER_THREAD_IDLE_TIME

        public static final String PROPERTY_SENDER_THREAD_IDLE_TIME
        This property's default is 10000 (ms) that means that idle sender threads that haven't send any message in the last 10 seconds and are not core threads will be removed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_DISCARD_POLICY

        public static final String PROPERTY_DISCARD_POLICY
        This property decides what to do with a logmessage that couldn't be delivered (because of connection loss, full queue, etc.) Possible values are: none|onconnectionloss|discard (Default is none)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_USE_DEPRECATED_PATH_FIELD_FOR_SUBPROCESSES

        public static final String PROPERTY_USE_DEPRECATED_PATH_FIELD_FOR_SUBPROCESSES
        New field subProcessPath has been added for Messageformat 4.1.0

        This Property can be set to use deprecated format; this might be used when sending to a server not compatible because he uses an older Messageformat version.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Reset the settings, which means everything will be deleted.

      • printPropertiesWithoutPasswords

        public void printPropertiesWithoutPasswords()
        This method prints all Properties, but the values of all keys that contains "password" or "credentials" are changed to "****".

      • printPropertiesWithoutPasswords

        public void printPropertiesWithoutPasswords(org.slf4j.Logger logger)
        This method prints all properties to the given logger, but the values of all keys that contain "password" or "credentials" are changed to "****".
        Parameters:
        logger - The logger used for printing properties.

      • getAllProperties

        public Properties getAllProperties()
        Return all Properties.They will be decoded because user cannot know which ones are encoded.
        Returns:
        the properties.

        Returns:

        public Properties filterAndCut(String prefix)

        Returns:
        new filtered and stripped Properties
